Set primer size

Set primer size

primerSize(settings, min = NULL, optimal = NULL, max = NULL)

Arguments

settings

a settings list created by `p3Settings`
min

minimal length (PRIMER_MIN_SIZE)
optimal

optimal length (PRIMER_OPT_SIZE)
max

maximal length (PRIMER_MAX_SIZE)

Value

a settings list with updated values

Examples

p3Settings() %>%
  primerSize(min = 18, optimal = 20, max = 22) %>%
  str()
#> List of 115
